title: The Perceptron: A Probabilistic Model for Information Storage and Organization in the Brain
summary: The seminal paper introducing the Perceptron. Rosenblatt proposes a probabilistic model for information storage in the brain, laying the mathematical foundation for modern artificial neural networks.
